bdglue2.encoder

Class ParallelEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • bdglue2.encoder.ParallelEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ParallelEncoder
extends Thread
    A class that manages the encoder thread pool, and itself runs as a thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParallelEncoder()
      construct an encoder with the number of threads specified in the properties for processing.
      ParallelEncoder(int numEncoders)
      Construct an encoder with the specified number of threads for processing.

      Initializes the ecoder with the specified number of Threads, etc.

      Puts the operation on the input queue for subsequent processing.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes the ecoder with the specified number of Threads, etc.

      • put

        public void put(DownstreamOperation op)
         throws InterruptedException
        Puts the operation on the input queue for subsequent processing.
        Parameters:
        op - the operation we are giving to a thread to encode
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting to put an operation on the queue

      • run

        public void run()
        This is the thread that harvests the encoded events from each of the encoders' queues and sends them onward for publishing.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class Thread

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Call this method to terminate the thread and exit.

      • sendToPublisher

        public void sendToPublisher(EncoderThread encoder)
                     throws InterruptedException
        Pull the next event off of the specified encoder and send it downstream for publishing.
        Parameters:
        encoder - the encoder we are working with
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if we are interrupted while wating to take an event or put it on the publisher's queue

      • status

        public String status()
        Generates the status of the encoder as a String.
        Returns:
        the status as a string

      • forceShutdown

        public static void forceShutdown(String msg)
        Static function that decouples downstream callers from the upstream handler. It simply forwards the message along to the upstream handler.
        Parameters:
        msg - a message to log
